name: Rabbit Rescue
description:
Once upon a time, there’s a kingdom where rabbits poop gold. The prince is cute and you’re just a poor woodman. 
One day, those cute rabbits have been kidnapped, let's shot with bubbles to save rabbits and win the prince's heart! :D 

GENRE
Gay-themed, Fantasy, Casual, Match Color, Bubble Shooter Game

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
  • P4 1.0Ghz
  • RAM 128MB
  • VGA 32MB
  • Windows XP (SP2)/Vista/7/10
  • HDD 100MB
NOTES FROM DEVELOPER

* Thank you for playing the game! :D
